snippet: SHAPIRO--Ronald, of Great Barrington, MA and Daytona Beach, FL, died peacefully at his home in Florida on May 21, 2016 at the age of 83. He is survived by his loving wife Evelyn, devoted children Alan (Nancy), Marci Silbert (Graeme) and Amy Guenzl (Simon), eight grandchildren and his brother, Lewis Shapiro. He was philanthropic, charitable and lived life to the fullest. Graveside service will be at 10am at Mt. Lebanon Cemetery in Glendale, NY followed by a Memorial Service at Frank E. Campbell "The Funeral Chapel" at 12:30pm on Madison Avenue and 81st Street. 1/3
